// Assign attribs to groups
// Assign items to groups

// upgrades.txt
"upgrades"
{
	// ITEM UPGRADES
	// Attributes generated by these will be attached to the chosen item.
	// This means the player can potentially invest in the same attribute on multiple items. 
	// Best to not use passives that affect player stats, because they'll stack on the player.
	"ItemUpgrades"
	{
		"1"
		{
			// Damage - Normal
			"attribute"	"damage bonus mvm"		// attrib to hook
			"icon"		"achievements/tf_demoman_kill_x_with_directpipe"
			"increment"	"0.25"				// percent
			"cap"		"2.0"				// percent
			"cost"		"400"				// first tier points/credits cost
			"group"     "damage"            // where can this upgrade appear
//			"mult"      "1.0"               // how much does increment and cap change with tf_mvm_upgrade_mult (defaults to 1)
//			"cost_mult" "1.0"				// how much does cost change with tf_mvm_upgrade_cost_mult (defaults to 1)
		}
		"1.1"
		{
			// Damage - Low
			"attribute"	"damage bonus mvm"
			"icon"		"achievements/tf_demoman_kill_x_with_directpipe"
			"increment"	"0.2"
			"cap"		"1.8"
			"cost"		"500"
			"group"     "damage_low"		// where can this upgrade appear
		}
		"1.2"
		{
			// Damage - Cheap
			"attribute"	"damage bonus mvm"
			"icon"		"achievements/tf_demoman_kill_x_with_directpipe"
			"increment"	"0.25"
			"cap"		"2.0"
			"cost"		"300"
			"group"     "damage_cheap"		// where can this upgrade appear
		}
		"2"
		{
			// Fire Speed - Normal
			"attribute"	"fire rate bonus mvm"	// attrib to hook
			"icon"		"achievements/tf_scout_dodge_damage"
			"increment"	"0.1667"				// percent
			"cap"		"1.6667"				// percent
			"cost"		"200"				// first tier points/credits cost
			"group"     "fire_rate"			// where can this upgrade appear
		}
		"2.1"
		{
			// Fire Speed - Expensive
			"attribute"	"fire rate bonus mvm"	// attrib to hook
			"icon"		"achievements/tf_scout_dodge_damage"
			"increment"	"0.1667"				// percent
			"cap"		"1.6667"				// percent
			"cost"		"350"
			"quality"	"1"					// allows varying usage cases without cloning attributes
											// 1 = low, 2 = normal (default), 3 = high
			"group"     "minigun"		// where can this upgrade appear
		}
		"2.1"
		{
			"attribute"	"melee attack rate bonus mvm"	// attrib to hook
			"icon"		"mvm/upgradeicons/upgrade_attackspeed"
			"increment"	"0.1667"				// percent
			"cap"		"1.6667"				// percent
			"cost"		"200"				// first tier points/credits cost
			"group"     "melee_swing"			// where can this upgrade appear
		}
		"3"
		{
			"attribute"	"clip size bonus upgrade mvm"	// attrib to hook
			"icon"		"achievements/tf_scout_destroy_sentry_with_pistol"
			"increment"	"0.5"				// percent
			"cap"		"3.0"				// percent
			"cost"		"400"				// first tier points/credits cost
			"group"     "clip"			// where can this upgrade appear
		}
		"3.1"
		{
			"attribute"	"maxammo primary increased mvm"	// attrib to hook
			"icon"		"achievements/tf_heavy_assist_grind"

			"cap"		"2.5"				// percent
			"cost"		"250"				// first tier points/credits cost
			"group"     "primary_ammo"		// where can this upgrade appear
		}
		"3.2"
		{
			"attribute"	"maxammo secondary increased mvm"	// attrib to hook
			"icon"		"achievements/tf_heavy_assist_grind"
			"increment"	"0.5"				// percent
			"cap"		"2.5"				// percent
			"cost"		"250"				// first tier points/credits cost
			"group"     "secondary_ammo"	// where can this upgrade appear
		}

			"cap"		"1"				// 
			"cost"		"400"
			"group"     "projectile_penetration"
			"mult"      "0.0"           // how much does increment and cap change with tf_mvm_upgrade_mult
		}
		"7.1"
		{
			// For Heavy

	// PLAYER UPGRADES
	// Attributes generated by these will be attached to the player.
	"PlayerUpgrades"
	{
		"1"
		{
			"attribute"	"dmg taken from fire reduced mvm"
			"icon"		"mvm/upgradeicons/upgrade_resistance_fire"
			"increment"	"1.0"			// 15% reduction
			"cap"		"4.0"			// 75% reduction max (.41 because of float rounding when comparing)
			"cost"		"150"
		}
		"2"
		{
			"attribute"	"dmg taken from blast reduced mvm"
